title: Unable to Open League Client
body: Clicking on LoL shortcut will open up to the 'League of Legends' title, but after a few seconds it freezes and says the League client isn't responding, with the usual options of to wait/close it. I've waited for about five minutes until I just gave up and closed it. Running as administrator used to work but it no longer does, is there any up-to-date ways to start League up?

replies.body:
Since you didn't mention Bugsplats or any sort of Patcher Kernel error, I'm convinced this is caused by a poor connection to the servers. I'd recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all your local settings are compatible with League before we investigate further.

Let me know if this helped.
Haha, sorry, I forgot to edit the OP to say that I had reinstalled and that everything was fine.
I'd rather wait a small window of time / seek out ways to solve this problem then wait a long time to install this.

Well, that may or may not work... I would suggest reinstalling the game over night or something, unless your internet is less than 500kb/s it wouldn't ever take that long or longer to reinstall. Plus, not doing anything and simply waiting for it to fix itself will most likely take longer. The client crashing like that is either an issue with settings which could potentially be fixed, but unlikely considering it's just the launcher, and who knows what that setting could be. I'd just reinstall if I were you. It wouldn't take long, and it'll most likely solve this issue unless it's a problem with your computer itself. Which is a possibility, but not a likely one.

alright, thanks
https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/1lps3z/if_client_is_not_starting_heres_the_fix_enjoy/

ive been using this reddit post to help me fix my problems (even if its outdated) but ive had no luck, im reinstalling it right now but it won't even open, popping up to the title but crashing a minute after.
